content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ crochet headbands that have a twisted look are trendy right now and i m bringing you a crochet version that has a knit-look stitch this stitch pattern is easy to learn and so therapeutic to work up my favorite thing about this stitch is the rewarding texture this is a great project for a beginner crocheter and comes with a video tutorial this headband is made in rounds as a tube then sewn together in a unique way to create that twisted crochet headband look **video tutorial ** https //youtu be/f7cek-vhtoe 1 **crochet hook ** & h 5 0 mm crochet hook 2 or size to obtain gauge **notions ** removable stitch markers if needed 3 yarn needle to weave in ends 4 scissors 5 **yarn ** wecrochet swish 6 worsted weight 100% superwash merino wool 110 yds/100m 50g colorways shown estuary heather copper nutmeg heather **yardage ** 2 skeins are needed per earwarmer headband approx 150-190 yards per earwarmer headband **abbreviations/stitches ** chain - chain round - round single_crochet - single_crochet ssc - split single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es **gauge ** 15 sts by 16 row = 4x4 inches stitch pattern with h hook **skill level ** beginner/easy **size/measurements ** sizes are written as small medium large height 4 4 5 4 75 inches adjustable earwarmer circumference is adjustable by how many rounds are crocheted the length of the earwarmer headband should be approximately 2 inches less than the head circumference head circumferences for reference baby 16-17 41-43 cm child 18-19 46-48 cm teen/small adult 20-21 51-53 cm adult 22-23 56-58 cm this pattern is available on the blog for free let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 7 instagram https //www instagram
